sense.gloss: escape, getaway, evasion
to run away, to flee, to get away (e.g. from danger), to escape, to break out, to leave (e.g. one's spouse)
to avoid (a question, responsibility, etc.), to evade, to dodge, to shirk, to back away
to win without being overtaken, to hold off the other contenders (until the finish), to keep the lead (and win)
to escape (of heat, a gas, etc.), to leak out (e.g. of a scent), to be lost (e.g. of flavor)
to fail to hold an ideal posture
overlooking
letting a good ball go by
escaping, evading
escape, flight, running away, elopement, fleeing
escape, evasion, flight
to escape
flight, desertion, escape
to miss (e.g. a chance), to lose, to let get away
to set free, to let go
to fail to ...
to miss, to overlook, to fail to notice
to let pass (a matter), to overlook (e.g. a wrongdoing), to turn a blind eye to
to pass up (e.g. an opportunity)
to let (a good ball) go by

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はただ↑人生↑↓じんせい↓の↑問題↑↓もんだい↓から↑逃↑↓に↓げているだけだよ。
sdata.e: You're just running away from life's problems.

sdata.j: ↑逃↑↓に↓げよう。サツが↑来↑↓き↓てる。
sdata.e: We're getting out of here. The cops are coming.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はなぜ↑逃↑↓に↓げ↑出↑↓だ↓そうとしたのですか。
sdata.e: Why did you try to run away?

sdata.j: このチャンスを↑逃↑↓のが↓す↑手↑↓て↓はないよ。
sdata.e: You had better avail yourself of this opportunity.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はここからすぐに↑逃↑↓に↓げたほうがよい。
sdata.e: You had better get away from here at once.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑早↑↓はや↓く↑決断↑↓けつだん↓をしなければ↑好機↑↓こうき↓を↑逃↑↓に↓がすことになるよ。
sdata.e: Unless you make a decision quickly, the opportunity will be lost.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓がそんなチャンスを↑逃↑↓のが↓すとは↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓だ。
sdata.e: It is a pity that you should lose such a chance.

sdata.j: ↑熊↑↓くま↓が↑眠↑↓ねむ↓ったり↑横↑↓よこ↓になるとき、その↑姿勢↑↓しせい↓は↑熱↑↓ねつ↓を↑逃↑↓のが↓したいのか↑保↑↓たも↓ちたいのかによる。
sdata.e: When bears sleep or lie down, their postures depend on whether they want to get rid of heat or conserve it.

sdata.j: ↑気違↑↓きちが↓いじみた↑愚↑↓おろ↓かな↑世俗↑↓せぞく↓の↑競争↑↓きょうそう↓から↑逃↑↓のが↓れたい。
sdata.e: I want to get away from the rat race.

sdata.j: ↑気↑↓き↓がつくと↑逃↑↓に↓げ↑場↑↓ば↓はどこにもなかった。
sdata.e: Now that I notice it, I have nowhere to run.

words.gloss: to run away, to flee, to get away (e.g. from danger), to escape, to break out, to leave (e.g. one's spouse)
